========================
INTSTRUCTIONS TO RUN THE PROJECT FROM COMMAND LINE
========================



To run the project from the command line, 

1> go to the dist folder 

2> Type the following:


 java -jar Lolcode_compiler.jar first.lol 

 NOTE: SPECIFY THE FILE IN .lol format directly as shown above if in the same folder or specify the path.

I have provided sample two programs file 'hello.lol' and 'first.lol'.
